[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic L,
    input logic q_in,
    input logic r_in,
    output logic Q
);

    logic mux_out;

    always_comb begin
        mux_out = L ? r_in : q_in;
    end

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        Q <= mux_out;
    end

endmodule
[DONE]

iterations.code:
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic L,
    input logic q_in,
    input logic r_in,
    output logic Q
);

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        if (L) begin
            Q <= r_in;
        end else begin
            Q <= q_in;
        end
    end

endmodule

[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic L,
    input logic q_in,
    input logic r_in,
    output logic Q
);

    logic mux_out;

    always_comb begin
        if (L) begin
            mux_out = r_in;
        end else begin
            mux_out = q_in;
        end
    end

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        Q <= mux_out;
    end

endmodule
[DONE]

[BEGIN]
module TopModule (
    input logic clk,
    input logic L,
    input logic q_in,
    input logic r_in,
    output logic Q
);

    logic mux_out;

    always_comb begin
        mux_out = L ? r_in : q_in;
    end

    always @(posedge clk) begin
        Q <= mux_out;
    end

endmodule
[DONE]
